title: Filter - Collection (ver. 1)
description:
This Collection includes:

Filter - 1994 - Erkenntnis Theorie (Demo)
Filter - 1995 - Hey Man Nice Shot (Both Singles)
Filter - 1995 - Short Bus
Filter - 1996 - Jurassitol (Single)
Filter - 1997 - (Can&#039;t You) Trip Like I Do (Single)
Filter - 1998 - One (Single)
Filter - 1999 - Title Of Record
Filter - 1999 - Welcome To The Fold (Single)
Filter - 2000 - Take A Picture (Single)
Filter - 2002 - The Amalgamut
Filter - 1994-2008 - Miscellaneous & Soundtrack Contributions
Army Of Anyone - 2006 - Army Of Anyone 
"also including one new track from the new Filter album being released in May 2008   Filter - Soldiers of Misfortune" 


Missing from this collection is:

Filter - Dose (singles)
Filter - Under (promo)
Filter - Captain Bligh (promo)
Filter - Title Of EP (Jap only remix ep)
Filter - The Best Things (promos and ep singles)
Filter - Where Do We Go From Here (Maxi-Single)
The Damning Well (the rest of the unreleased album)
State of Mind (side project)
Midnight Panic (side project)
Filter - Anthems for the Damned (new album 2008)

this torrent only includes mp3 audio files and jpg/gif album images
no videos are included here.

no bootlegs or live concert recordings are featured here either.
